home.text_base_description: Large top floor 3BR/2BA Edwardian condo in a 3-unit association on Palm tree-lined Dolores St. * A fully detached building this unit gets extraordinary light via 21 windows on all 4 sides * Wonderful architectural details include 10' ceilings, wainscoting & box beam ceilings * Formal living room w/ gas fireplace, recessed lighting & crown molding is adjacent and open to a family room providing a uniquely grand scale * Formal dining room is open to the kitchen & has beautiful details * Updated kitchen has quartz counter tops, center island and stainless steel appliances Primary bedroom has excellent closet space and an en-suite updated bath * 2 additional bedrooms, a 2nd updated BA & a laundry room * 1 car independent garage parking & additional storage * Hardwood floors throughout & carpet in the bedrooms and stairs * Fantastic Mission Dolores location. Walk to Dolores Park & the shops and restaurants in the Castro & Valencia Corridor. Close to tech shuttle stops & public transport
